timeline.message:
Web console autocompaction E2E test

Add an E2E test for the common case web console workflow of setting up
autocompaction that changes the partitions from dynamic to hashed.

Also fix an issue with the async test setup to properly wait for the web
console to be ready.

timeline.bodyText: For reviewers: To disable headless mode, change createBrowserNormal to createBrowserDebug
timeline.author: ccaominh

replies.bodyText: I think in the future we could make this be driven by an environment variable
replies.author: vogievetsky
